text: Kylie Jenner marked a milestone on Thursday. The now 20 - year - old celebrated her birthday with a lingerie photo she posted to Instagram. In the sultry snap, the lipstick mogul flaunts her phenomenal figure wearing lace semi - sheer underwear. Birthday girl : Kylie Jenner took to Instagram to mark her 20th birthday with a sultry snap on Thursday And it wasn't just her voluptuous curves that was catching people's attention as she also sported a blonde wig. The Kylie Lipkit mogul gave a simple yet direct caption for her steamy photo :'20 '. Hours later, she posted another smoldering snap from the same shoot. The photo left little to the imagination, and depicted the model looking toward the heavens
